txt.en: I don't know half of you as well as I'd like and I like less than half, half as well as you deserve...
Visit the Stone-trolls' Glade in the Trollshaws

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.

<rgb=#00FF00> This version of the quest includes only objectives found within Eriador and is available to players of all levels. </rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Pull the wooden box out from beneath Bilbo's Bed in Elrond's House
This is Sting! Take it if you like, and also this mithril mail. We Hobbits must stick together, especially Bagginses!
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.
This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
It's in an envelope here on the mantlepiece, if you must know. Well, no! Here it is in my pocket. That's odd!
To think these were the very three trolls Bilbo had told of, turned to stone while quarreling over how to cook thirteen dwarves and one hobbit!
He said if I had the cheek to sing of EÃ¤rendil in the house of Elrond, it was my affair!
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
Stand upon a table near the Party Tree and give a <rgb=#FF00FF>talk</rgb>
Check what's on the mantlepiece in Bag End
<rgb=#FF00FF>Sing</rgb> to Bilbo in the Hall of Fire in Rivendell
